data.Sentence_cn: 那个女士为什么指着那个手提箱？
data.Sentence: Look at picture K. Why is the lady pointing at the suitcase?

data.Sentence_cn: 因为她想让他搬。
data.Sentence: Because she wants him to carry it.

data.Sentence_cn: 他为什么给她照片?
data.Sentence: Picture R. Why is he giving her his photograph?

data.Sentence_cn: 因为他想她保存。
data.Sentence: Because he wants her to keep it.

data.Sentence_cn: 她为什么和他们说再见？
data.Sentence: Picture V. Why is she saying good bye to them?

data.Sentence_cn: 因为她不想他们误了车。
data.Sentence: Because she doesn't want them to miss it.

data.Sentence_cn: 她为什么要从他手里拿过刀？
data.Sentence: Picture Z. Why is she taking the knife from him?

data.Sentence_cn: 因为她不想他割到。
data.Sentence: Because she doesn't want him to cut himself.

data.Sentence_cn: 为什么警察对那个男人和女人说话？
data.Sentence: Picture O. Why is the policeman talking to the man and the woman?

data.Sentence_cn: 因为他想他们把它移一下。
data.Sentence: Because he wants them to move it.

data.Sentence_cn: 为什么那个女人告诉那个女孩要小心。
data.Sentence: Picture Y. Why is the woman telling the girl to be careful?

data.Sentence_cn: 因为她不想她把它丢了。
data.Sentence: Because she doesn't want her to lose it.

data.Sentence_cn: 他为什么放唱片？
data.Sentence: Picture M. Why is he putting a record on?

data.Sentence_cn: 因为他想让他们听。
data.Sentence: Because he wants them to listen to it.

data.Sentence_cn: 为什么她要和小男孩谈话？
data.Sentence: Picture S. Why is she talking to the little boy?

data.Sentence_cn: 因为她不想他伤到他自己。
data.Sentence: Because she doesn't want him to hurt himself.

data.Sentence_cn: 服务员为什么对这个人说话？
data.Sentence: Picture N. Why is the attendant talking to the man?

data.Sentence_cn: 因为他想让他来描述一下它。
data.Sentence: Because he wants him to describe it.

data.Sentence_cn: 这个男人为什么让他妻子看新车？
data.Sentence: Picture X. Why is the man showing his new car to his wife?

data.Sentence_cn: 因为他不想她开车。
data.Sentence: Because he doesn't want her to drive it.

title.title_cn: 我要你/他/她/他们…… 告诉他/她/他们……
title.title: I want you/him/her/them to... Tell him/her/them to...
